players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and he knows who the mafioso is."
Diana: "Charlie, your statement might be a clue, but remember, I'm the mafioso and I've already taken action. Think carefully about what you know."
You: "I am a villager and I heard Charlie's statement. He said he is the detective, but Diana claims she is the mafioso. This seems suspicious to me. I will keep an eye on both of them."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie

Alice: "I am a villager and I heard Charlie's statement. He said he is the detective, but Diana claims she is the mafioso. This seems suspicious to me. I will keep an eye on both of them."
